input.sentences: the show we saw when we were on vacation was great .
there were so many disney tales being told on stage .
afterward they all got up together for an encore .
we all had a great time there .
output.sentences: Valee and her mom were on another Disney vacation, they loved to see the ice shows especially.
The skaters presented many Disney favorites reimagined for the rink.
The villians were always a favorite for many, Malificient looked amazing that night.
Mickey, not wanting to be outdone by the other wizards, changed into his outfit from Sorcerers Apprencice.
Mini was not that impressed with his bathrobe and waited alone at the other side of the rink.
